definitions.definition: A ceremony to honor and remember a deceased person , often distinguished from a memorial service by the presence of the body of the deceased .
examples: Many mourners turned up at the local artist's funeral to pay homage.

main_definition: A ceremony to honor and remember a deceased person , often distinguished from a memorial service by the presence of the body of the deceased .
secondary_definitions: ( dated , chiefly in the plural ) A funeral sermon .
